roleset.name: cause an emotional reaction

role.descr: thing provoked, or reaction when separate secondary impelled agent is present
secondary impelled agent, when separate from reaction

example.name: provoke-v: basic case
example.text: Economists say a buildup in inventories can provoke cutbacks in production that can lead to a recession .

propbank.arg: cutbacks in production that can lead to a recession

example.name: provoke-v: misparsed object
example.text: The compromise bill passed the House last week but has now provoked jurisdictional fights with the Senate Foreign Relations Committee , which jealously protects its prerogatives over operations at the State Department .

propbank.arg: jurisdictional fights with the Senate Foreign Relations Committee , which jealously protects its prerogatives over operations at the State Department

example.name: provoke-v: with separate secondary impelled agent
example.text: To say that the Pentagon should act irresponsibly because acting responsibly will provoke Congress into acting irresponsibly leads to the conclusion that the Pentagon should deliberately exaggerate its needs in the national interest ; in other words , thatit is justified in committing a crime -- lying to Congress --because it is morally superior .

example.name: provoking-j
example.text: The writer compared the official news reports on April 2nd and April 3rd with the Songyuan Municipal Soft Environment Office ' sfindings on this case and found several questionable points , which were thought - provoking .

example.name: provocation-n: Args 0 and 1
example.text: The provocation of rumors and slander by some foreign reactionary organizations

example.name: provocative-j
example.text: But the truth is , that , in such cases , we generally find the humor ourselves which is provocative of laughter ;

example.name: provoking-j
example.text: the photography is thought provoking ; the video installations captivating ; and the paintings strikingly fresh .

roleset.note: PROVOKE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'provoke' based on sentences in wsj; adjectival 'provoking' based on BOLT-6. Member of Vnclsamuse-31.1, engender-27. (from provoke.01-v) PROVOCATION-N NOTES: Based on Bolt data. Comparison toprovoke.01. Provoke.01 is a member of VN classes amuse-31.1 andengender-27.Framed by Katie. (from provocation.01-n) PROVOCATIVE-J NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an aliasfile for unification. (from provocative.01-j) PROVOKING-J NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an aliasfile for unification. (from provoking.01-j)

roleset.name: provoke sexual arousal

example.name: provocative-j
example.text: Their dress is provocative , the music is suggestive and the girls ' body language is seductive .

example.name: provoke-v
example.text: We ’re lying to ourselves if we say those pop culture icons were just aesthetically pleasing , because they were more thanthat – they provoked sexual thoughts and tendencies .

roleset.note: PROVOKE-V NOTES: Split off from existing .01 roleset by Julia for unification. PROVOCATIVE-J NOTES: Split off from existing .01 roleset byJulia for unification.
